product_name: CamelBak M.U.L.E. NV Hydration Pack - 100 fl. oz.
long_description: An update on a longtime favorite, the redesigned CamelBak M.U.L.E. NV hydration pack provides plenty of gear storage and water capacity to let you enjoy the riding trails all day long. D-Fit(TM) shoulder straps slide along a plastic component to automatically find the most comfortable position on wide or narrow shoulders. NV(TM) lightweight back panel features articulating pods that hold the load away from your back for dependable ventilation. 100 fl. oz. Antidote(TM) reservoir is equipped with the Quick Link(TM) connection system for hassle-free removal of the drinking tube. Big Bite(TM) valve is easy to use-just bite and sip; HydroLock(TM) valve shuts off water, ensuring no leakage during transport. Reservoir compartment features an easy-access perimeter zipper. Hipbelt pockets and 3 zippered compartments-1 with a gear organizer-carry everything you need for epic day trips. Overflow storage quickly lashes down a rain shell or extra layer via 2 sets of compression straps. Top zippered pocket has a microfleece lining and holds your media player. Strap management system secures straps, keeping loose ends to a minimum. Removable raincover helps keep your gear dry in wet weather. Reflective highlights increase visibility in low light.
